column3: I would even formulate it as "makes getrawtransaction work" - the speed advantage is small compared to it otherwise being completely unreliable.\n
ok, updated.\nI just think, there is documentation missing, for what really the txindex is there for.\n
just change the description to "Maintain a full transaction index as used by the getrawtransaction rpc call". No need to to a () after the main () :)\n
